article.Heading: Storymap: Which Indian state spends the most on higher education
article.Summary: Published annually, it captures the latest developments in higher education from a policy perspective, both at the central and state levels.
article.Body:
Sidhartha Shukla
moneycontrol.com

The following storymap is based on Annual Status of Higher Education in States (ASHE) report created by the Confederation of Indian Industry (CII) and Deloitte India.

Published annually, it captures the latest developments in higher education from a policy perspective, both at the central and state levels.
